main event: A civilian reported a UFO sighting in Albuquerque, New Mexico on June 28, 1965, observing a small round object resembling a steady white star-like light.
interesting points: The object was described as white, small, and round, similar to a star of 2nd magnitude., The sighting lasted for about 25 minutes., The object exhibited slow motion and was moving eastward., Three people witnessed the sighting without optical aids., The object's motion against the background was noted to rule out satellites and aircraft.
sighted object: a small round white object resembling a steady light
